en.title: Customs draw close to target
body_lines: The Customs Department says that the target of Rs. 1.53 Tax Revenue Tariff This Year
Additional Director General of the Director General, Customs Media Spokesperson Salviti Arukgoda said that Rs. 1.38 million has been added to Rs 1.38 trillion.

summary_lines: "Customs Department reaches tax revenue target: Rs. 1.53 trillion this year. Additional Director General Salviti Arukgoda states Rs. 1.38 trillion collected so far."
